文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: The mechanical properties of the final tubes depend on the final heat treatment and slightly on the first steps of the fabrication sequence, leading to small differences in the grain size.
工艺步骤: final heat treatment, first fabrication steps

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: The nodular corrosion sensitivity of the recrystallized cladding tubes points out the influence of the early fabrication steps: The increase of the alpha annealing temperature in any fabrication step is detrimental.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: Among the tubes tested in this program those with the best nodular corrosion resistance in the high-pressure steam test had the worst behavior using ASTM Practice for Aqueous Corrosion Testing of Samples of Zirconium and Zirconium Alloys (G 2).

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: During the ASTM G 2 test the weight gain of the external surface of the tubes was higher than the weight gain of the internal surface.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: It was found that a high cooling rate from the beta or alpha-plus-beta range is the best way to achieve products with good nodular corrosion resistance in a high-pressure steam test [3]

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_035_chunk1
证据片段: subsequent hot working, and alpha annealing after cold rolling, led to a decrease in the nodular corrosion resistance [4]
工艺步骤: hot working, alpha annealing, cold rolling

证据片段: A 6-ton ingot of Zircaloy-4 produced from multiple vacuum-arc melts was broken down in the beta range into bars of $1 8 0 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ diameter
